com.dhemery.network

Interface SerializingEndpoint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CodecEndpoint

    public interface SerializingEndpoint
    Wraps an endpoint to allow it to send and return serializable objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T get(String path, Class<T> responseType)
      Send an HTTP GET request to the given path and deserialize the response into an object.
      <T> T put(String path, Object body, Class<T> responseType)
      Serialize the given object, send it via HTTP PUT and deserialize the response into an object.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        <T> T get(String path,
        Class<T> responseType)
        Send an HTTP GET request to the given path and deserialize the response into an object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of object to return
        Parameters:
        path - the path to GET
        responseType - the class of the type of object to return
        Returns:
        the object created by deserializing the GET response body into type T

      • put

        <T> T put(String path,
        Object body,
        Class<T> responseType)
        Serialize the given object, send it via HTTP PUT and deserialize the response into an object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of object to return
        Parameters:
        path - the path to which ot send the message
        body - the object to serialize as the body of the message
        responseType - the class of the type of object to return
        Returns:
        the object created by deserializing the PUT response body into type T
